serversidehorror.deimosconfig.title: Sever Side Horror Config
serversidehorror.deimosconfig.grace_peri: Delay in days at the start of the game before this mod starts being active
serversidehorror.deimosconfig.herobrine_: Chance of spawning Herobrine staring at you per tick
Enable spawning Herobrine staring at you
serversidehorror.deimosconfig.fake_joine: Chance of a fake player joining per tick
serversidehorror.deimosconfig.jumpscare_: Chance a player being jump scared per tick
serversidehorror.deimosconfig.long_night: Chance a night being long night night
serversidehorror.deimosconfig.break_torc: Chance a for random torches to get destroyed per tick
serversidehorror.deimosconfig.replace_to: Chance a for torches to ger replaced by redstone ones per tick
serversidehorror.deimosconfig.random_lig: Chance a player to be striken by a lightning per tick
Enable random players being striken by a lighting
serversidehorror.deimosconfig.fake_minin: Chance for a player to hear fake mining noises per tick
Enable players hearing fake mining noises
serversidehorror.deimosconfig.fake_steps: Chance for a player to hear fake step noises per tick
Enable players hearing fake step noises
serversidehorror.deimosconfig.old_villag: Allow old villages to appear in your world
serversidehorror.deimosconfig.traps_enab: Allow traps to appear in your world
serversidehorror.commands.locate.structu: Couldn't find the structure you were looking for because it was disabled in the config
